Nakita ko lang ito sa isang poste sa O-: What happened UP System? :(The School of Health Sciences (SHS) was once hailed as the ""heart & soul"" of UP System
column3: and that a ""social conscience"" college after its graduate doctors/nurses/midwives stay & work in the country especially in the most depressed
column4: rural areas where community people see no doctor/health worker all their lifetime. Where most of the Filipino doctors or nurses go abroad (from the 60's up to the present times)
column5: UP-SHS graduates stay to fulfill the University's mandate of being the ""University of the PEOPLE"" (of the Filipino people)
column6: a university that cares in improving the health care system of the country.More than ever
column7: SHS needs your help. Until now
column9: for the school itself is 'beyond repair'. No classrooms
column11: and even no decent boarding houses for the students. The local administration of SHS under the leadership of Dean Buddy Destura (a UP-SHS alumnus) is doing all its best to rebuild the school you dubbed as the ""heart & soul"" of UP. We call on our fellow alumni (from the entire UP system
column14: and all Filipinos out there to help us rebuild UP-SHS once again. Helping SHS is ""securing"" that depressed
column15: rural communities will have a health worker to attend to the health needs of the people.

Christmas season noon at madaming kids na nangangaroling sa loob ng campus. A kid asked me while I was sitting sa may DevCom sa Carabao Park... Nakasuot ako ng boots tapos red pants nun.. Medyo may kulay pa yung buhok..Bata: Kuya Wyre ka ba? Me: Ah e
column3: hindi e. Porma lang 'to.Bata: Anong pangarap mo?Nagulat ako... Hindi ko alam isasagot ko...Me: I want to be a professor
column4: teacher ng mga college students. Ikaw? Bata: Gusto ko maging abogado
column5: nakakulong kasi tatay ko. Gusto ko siya ilabas sa kulungan kaso wala kaming pera. Napagkamalan siyang magnanakaw nung pinagtatrabahuhan niya.Me: Ilan kayong magkakapatid?Bata: Lima
column6: ngayon tatlo na lang.Me: Bakit? Anong nangyari?Bata: Namatay kasi yung kakambal ko nung baby pa lang kami. Tapos yung kuya ko
column8: ganun ba.. nakakalungkot naman. Nasan yung nanay mo?Bata: Nasa bahay
column9: inaalagaan yung kapatid ko.. may sakit kasi.Hindi ko alam kung ano mafefeel ko that time
column10: ramdam ko kasi yung agony nung bata. Pero ayun
column11: naglalaro siya kasama yung mga kaibigan niya at kumakanta ng mga carols sa mga nakaupo. Bigla kong natanong...Me: San mo gusto mag aral ng college?Bata: Dito siyempre sa UP.Me: Aral kang mabuti ha? Gusto ko after 10 years

column13: pero hindi ko na siya nakita dun ulit. Sana okay lang siya. Sana makapasok din siya sa UP.

column26: now I'm hearing ""I love you."" I was nothing to her at that time that she even forgot how we met and now we are about to celebrate our first anniversary.This might not be a really good story since i don't wanna put a lot of details coz somethings are better to be understood between the two of us. I just want to share it because every decision i made from when i was in HS
column27: to go to UPLB and up to this day brought me to this place to where i am
column28: to this happiness. From 7 years me who only saw her as an impossible girl to get
column29: to the me now who sees her as the best girl I could ever have. This is not something I want to share because i want to make kilig moments for me and gather some likes
column30: i just want to share this and to let everyone know that everything is possible
column31: that the person you thought you could only wish for can be yours
column32: that someone is really out there that would make all those cheesy lines real
column33: that all the love songs that you used to quote are now applicable to you
column34: that waiting really is worth it coz it happened to me and it all started at a simple laugh in UPLB.

Nakita ko lang ito sa isang poste sa O-: UP COLLEGE OF DENTISTRYFrequently Asked Questions(aka ""Yung mga sagot na paulit-ulit ko nang tinatype sa cellphone
column3: I should have them saved to my Templates already"".)Q: Pwede ba po magpa-braces?A: Pwede po! Unfortunately
column4: wala po akong kilala talaga sa postgrad (Ortho) department
column5: so I can't give you much information about that. Also
column6: mahaba-haba na po ang waiting list for new patients...Q: Magkano estimated for crown/bridge/dentures?A: As it's written po sa service menu that was posted
column7: there is a set price (for the materials that WE use IN THE SCHOOL) plus a varying price for the lab fee. The lab fee will depend on the material to be used by the lab (to be collectively determined by your needs/requests and the clinician's judgment) and the lab that your attending clinician chooses. Hindi po ako makakapagbigay ng reliable estimate kasi HIGHLY varied po ang fees ng iba't ibang labs. They can range from as low as 200 to as high as 3000.Q: Pwede po magpasched?A: Unless you have a referral slip from another dentist
column8: I cannot know specifically what your treatment needs are
column9: and thus it will be hard for me to refer you to a clinician for scheduling on your FIRST visit. May requirements po kasi kami
column10: and while we're not strictly limited to fulfilling only those requirements
column11: admittedly we want to concentrate first on which ones we still need to fulfill before taking on any extra cases. If you are a first-time patient with no attending clinician yet
column12: the best thing to do is to come to UP by 8am/1pm to register for diagnosis. After your first chart is completed
column13: only then will we be able to set schedules for your treatment.Q: May makakagawa na po ba pagdating ko?A: Again
column14: it depends on what treatment you need. We cannot guarantee that there will be clinicians available to take your case upon your arrival. Minsan meron
column15: pero most of the time wala kasi may mga naka-sched na po kami na patients of our own. So sana po maintindihan ninyo that we might not be able to attend to you immediately once you've been diagnosed
column16: and sana hindi na po kayo maging sobrang demanding to the point na ang mga prof na po namin mismo yung nagagalit sa potential patients kasi unreasonable po yung gusto niyong mangyari.-- Corollary: Kung hindi po kayo makakarating
column17: PLEASE inform your clinician as early as possible. A huge factor sa pagkadelay ng graduation is because of requirements that aren't completed due to patients' non-compliance with their scheduled appointments. Nagtatabi po kami ng mga half-day/whole day for you
column18: hindi kami nagsisingit basta-basta ng ibang pasyente unless we're absolutely sure that that schedule is free. So please
column19: sana respetuhin niyo rin po ang oras namin. Kung hindi kayo dadating
column20: sabihan kami agad para makapaghanap kami ng ibang pasyente at hindi nasasayang ang mga half-day namin na palibot-libot lang na walang ginagawa. :)Q: Matagal ba ang treatment?A: Sa isang salita -- oo. Bakit? Nagpapacheck po kasi kami
column21: and every step ang kailangan ipa-check. Minsan matagal bago macheckan kasi madami kaming nagpapacheck sa kakaunting prof
column23: minsan nawawala ang profs kasi may klase sa preclinical subjects or may urgent matters to attend to or nakikipag-chikahan pa (:PPPPP)... And bago kami mag-umpisa ng trabaho
column24: nagkakaroon pa muna ng mini-discussion about the case
column25: unlike some other schools na basta sinasabi lang ng mga prof is ""Okay"" and nag-uumpisa na sila agad (I witnessed this for myself).Q: Ga'no katagal matapos ang root canal / bridges / dentures / *insert other multiple-visit procedures here*?A: That will depend on your compliance with your schedule. We start by doing work-ups of your case (pictures
column29: which will take half a day. Then there's case discussion with a prof
column30: and that WILL take multiple sessions. (Our profs want to make sure we know what we're doing before we even start doing anything. You understand.) Please remember that yours is not the only case we are handling -- we have several requirements that all need our attention equally. -- Corollary: Tumatagal po ang trabaho pag nala-late kayo. Obviously :) So please come on time.Q: Pwede magpasched on Wednesday?A: Unless your appointment is for complete or removable partial dentures

Anyare?Me: *tsinismis ang lahat habang itinuturo si Isko... tumatawa pa rin hanggang sa bumaba with Iska1 malapit sa Ilang*--------To Isko
